summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the Alley between blocks 11 and 12, Evans & Blewett's Addition, being the alley between 4th Avenue West and 5th Avenue West, from West Crockett Street to West Howe Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 9288 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
